lead_paragraph: Al Harrington and Stephen Jackson each scored 27 points, Jermaine O’Neal made two key layups in his first game since issuing a challenge to his Indiana teammates, and the Pacers defeated the New Orleans Hornets, 100-93, last night in Oklahoma City.
